name: SpeedRunShopping
description:
Run and collect certain items from the list.
To unlock random mode you need to pass all normal levels
To unlock hard mode you need to find hidden item on the one of the normal levels

Compete with your friends who has the best record!

Control:
Tab-  shopping menu
WASD - move
LMB - collect items

If you find bugs, please report them in the comments, thanks.
